Delivering Trusted Cold-Chain Logistics for Life Sciences

TailorMed supports biotech and medical shipments with validated temperature-controlled solutions across Taiwan and expanding North America routes.

TailorMed at a Glance

TailorMed is a Taiwan-based life-science logistics provider specializing in temperature-controlled transport for biotech and medical shipments. We combine validated packaging solutions with real-time temperature monitoring to ensure product integrity and regulatory compliance. Our service network currently covers Taiwan with strategic expansion toward North America routes.

ICON

Temperature-controlled logistics

Validated cold-chain transport for sensitive life-science materials.

ICON

Validated packaging solutions

Qualified packaging systems for all temperature ranges.

ICON

Real-time temperature monitoring

Continuous tracking and data logging throughout transit.

ICON

Expanding North America coverage

Growing coverage from Taiwan to North America routes.
